ClassDesc: Transfer object for pointer coordinates. Objects of this type can be used to specify the pointer coordinates when creating new @B_android#view#MotionEvent_E@ objects and to query pointer coordinates in bulk. Refer to @B_android#view#InputDevice_E@ for information about how different kinds of input devices and sources represent pointer coordinates.
